english.segment1: There's a me that I don't really like. A me that says I'm. In control til the day that I die. And I dont know why. I push I pull I fight I fall. I end up crawling back to. That place where I figure it out. That I, that I, that I
english.segment2: I'M SECOND TO ONE. REDEEMER, THE WAY, THE LIGHT. I'M SECOND TO ONE. THE SAVIOR. NO COMPROMISE. I'M LAYING EVERYTHING. AT THE FOOT OF THE CROSS . MY PRIDE, MY LIFE, MY ALL. I AM SECOND TO ONE. AND HE IS SECOND TO NONE
english.segment3: There's a change when I swallow my pride. And I surrender. There's a peace when I open my eyes. Cuz I remember. To live's to die. To fall's to rise. To kneel's to find the Savior. Here I am and I've figured it out. Tonight tonight tonight..
english.segment4: He said "You come alive. When you lose your life". so I lay it down. Yeah I surrender all
